abstracts.cdata!:
The Second Highway Project comprises:
            (a) construction to two-lane paved standards of about 200 km
            of a national highway between Sawatambang and Muarabungo and
            supervision by consultants; (b) detailed engineering of an
            extension, about 300 km long, of the national highway
            between Muarabungo and Lubuklinggau; (c) a regional study of
            the area served by the Sawatambang-Muarabungo-Lubuklinggau
            national highway and subsequent detailed engineering of
            about 500 km of feeder roads in that area; and (d) detailed
            engineering of about 700 km of a national highway between
            Padang and Medan and of some 500 km of related feeder roads.
